german: dreckiges Schwein (fig, ugs, pej, vulg, ungepflegte, Person, n)

english: to grab one's luck by the scruff of its neck (idiom)
to have sb. by the scruff of the neck
to take sb. by the scruff of his / her neck
german: jdn. am / beim Kanthaken nehmen (Idiom, jdn, am, Genick, packen, und, zur, Rede, stellen)

english: to take sb. by the scruff of the neck
to take sb. by the scruff of the neck
